com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Interface Cacher.Instructions

  • Enclosing class:
    Cacher<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>

    public static interface Cacher.Instructions
    Indicates whether the current cached data should be taken from the cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onIOStreamer(Cacher.Status status)
      Invoked every time the underlying business object is bound to be fetched from the Business.IOStreamer, or when it has actually been retrieved.
      void onUriStreamParser(Cacher.Status status)
      Invoked every time the underlying business object is bound to be fetched from the Business.UriStreamParser, or when it has actually been retrieved.
      boolean queryTimestamp()
      Is invoked to determine whether the persistence timestamp field should be requested, on the Business.IOStreamer layer.
      boolean takeFromCache(java.util.Date timestamp)
      Indicates whether the underlying business is still valid regarding its storage timestamp.

    • Method Detail

      • queryTimestamp

        boolean queryTimestamp()
        Is invoked to determine whether the persistence timestamp field should be requested, on the Business.IOStreamer layer.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the timestamp of the underlying business object should be requested on the persistence layer

      • takeFromCache

        boolean takeFromCache(java.util.Date timestamp)
        Indicates whether the underlying business is still valid regarding its storage timestamp. Is invoked in two ways:
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the date corresponding to the last data retrieval ; may be null, and will be if the queryTimestamp() previously returned false
        Returns:
        true if and only if the business object state should be taken from the persistence layer

      • onIOStreamer

        void onIOStreamer(Cacher.Status status)
        Invoked every time the underlying business object is bound to be fetched from the Business.IOStreamer, or when it has actually been retrieved. from it.
        Parameters:
        status - indicates the status: Cacher.Status.Attempt when first attempting, Cacher.Status.Success when successfully retrieved

      • onUriStreamParser

        void onUriStreamParser(Cacher.Status status)
        Invoked every time the underlying business object is bound to be fetched from the Business.UriStreamParser, or when it has actually been retrieved.
        Parameters:
        status - indicates the status: Cacher.Status.Attempt when first attempting, Cacher.Status.Success when successfully retrieved
